npcs.name: Mayor Luthor Graves
npcs.description: A seasoned politician struggling to maintain order as superpowered conflicts escalate.
notable_interactions: Introduces the hero to the city's political landscape.

npcs.name: Detective Anya Calloway
npcs.description: A no-nonsense investigator who specializes in tracking rogue metahumans.
notable_interactions: Helps the player uncover criminal activities.
May request assistance in major cases.

npcs.name: Lady Venom
npcs.description: A ruthless crime lord with enhanced reflexes and venom-based abilities.
notable_interactions: A potential recurring villain or uneasy ally.

npcs.name: Iron Maw
npcs.description: A former human turned into a war machine, leading rogue AI soldiers.
notable_interactions: Leads a major encounter in the 'Rise of the Machines' arc.
Can provide cybernetic enhancements—at a price.

npcs.name: Dr. Evelyn Rook
npcs.description: A genius scientist working on AI ethics and human-cybernetic relations.
notable_interactions: Provides hacking tools and AI research.
May defect based on player's choices.

npcs.name: Lord Viktor Frost
npcs.description: A centuries-old warrior who guards the tundra’s ancient secrets.
notable_interactions: Tests the player’s worth in battle.

npcs.name: The Time Wanderer
npcs.description: An enigmatic figure who appears in multiple timelines, offering cryptic warnings.

npcs.name: The Void Monarch
npcs.description: A cosmic being that seeks to unravel reality itself.
notable_interactions: Offers the player ultimate power—for a price.

npcs.name: Detective Lane
npcs.description: A hard-boiled detective investigating the surge of superpowered individuals.
notable_interactions: Investigates crimes related to superpowered conflicts.

npcs.name: Dr. Sylva
npcs.description: A scientist researching the sudden metahuman awakening.

npcs.name: Lord Midnight
npcs.description: A shadowy crime lord pulling the strings in Paragon's underworld.
